title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: APT and FIL Gain 6.8% as All Assets Trade Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Chainlink (LINK) joined Aptos (APT) and Filecoin (FIL) as a top performer, gaining 6.7% from Monday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3447.59, up 4.2% (+139.62) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

All 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: APT (+6.8%) and FIL (+6.8%).

Laggards: XLM (+1.4%) and DOT (+2.7%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: All 20 assets in the CoinDesk 20 Index are trading higher with the index up 4.2%, indicating broad market gains and positive momentum.
